entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:56PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A Strong Storm Moves Through the Panhandle... A gale force low with a significant source of moisture is currently moving through the the Gulf of Alaska. So far around 1 to 1.5 inches of rain has fallen across the area with another 1 to 1.5 before the heaviest precipitation looks to shift away from Juneau this evening. Small streams are expected to rapid rises

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 9:27AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The Indian River including areas within the National Park and other small streams in the Sitka area. * WHEN...Until 915 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. Soils remain moist

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS
